Set the time period and currency for your analysis.
Revenue & Direct Costs
Core sales and direct production/service costs per unit.

Profitability Goals
Set targets to see what's required to achieve them.

Enter your target profit margin (e.g., 15 for 15%). Leave blank if you only want break-even analysis. Calculations assume this margin is applied to Revenue After Returns. Tax implications are considered if taxes are enabled.

Include additional details for a more comprehensive analysis.
